```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(skimr)
```

```{r import data}
cows <- readr::read_csv(here::here("projects/project_4/swiss_cows_data.csv"))
```
#Part 2
Perform a t-test using the first 3 cows of each breed and answer the question:
Are Brown Swiss cows heavier than Swiss Red Holstein cows ?

```{r}
cows_03 <- cows |> 
  filter(num <= 3)
```

```{r summary table}
cows_03 |> 
  group_by(breed) |> 
  skim()
```
